headline: State Attorney General to Look Into Whether Subway Arrests Reflect ‘Racial Biases’
abstract: New York’s attorney general said she would examine whether policing in the transit system was tainted by bias.
lead_paragraph: New York State’s attorney general waded into the debate over policing in New York City’s transit system on Monday, saying she was investigating whether the police were discriminating against people of color in enforcing fare evasion on subways and buses.
